changelog: Added Starlike Client
Updated EaglercraftX 1.8 to u37
Added Sweet Cherry 16x texture pack
New setting to open new tab instead of popup
Added an offline download for Eaglercraft Zeta 1.11
Added Precision Client
Fixed some CSS bugs
Added Eaglercraft Zeta 1.11
Console logs are now shown while playing
Added importing and exporting launcher data
Eaglercraft 1.9 has been updated to v0.7.0
Tutorials have been added to the launcher, go check them out!
You can now install mods directly from the mods list
Bugfix: Themes no longer flicker when navigating
You can now install the launcher as a PWA web app
Added welcome and setup screen
Show changelog when the launcher is updated
Added themes and backgrounds
Settings now update automatically without saving them
You will now stay on the same page when reloading
Username rules have been updated to match Minecraft
Redesigned archive page
Added offline page
Added Eaglercraft 1.2.5
Added more mods and resource packs
Fix and optimize mobile site
Added a mods and resource packs list
Temporary workaround for keyboard not working in the game
Moved most images and assets to this websites in case they are blocked
Added a 404 page
Added Discord link to bottom bar
Added Peyton's Infdev and Classic versions
Updated client versions
Major rewrite, check it out yourself!

mods.name: Burmod
mods.description: client for eaglerforge (v0.2)
mods.author: Murturtle

mods.name: StatsHud
mods.description: An all-new StatsHud, soon to be updated with customization functionality!
mods.author: Neverflagastralis

mods.name: FreshEaglerUI
mods.description: Makes the UIs slide in and re works the main screen!
mods.author: Murturtle

mods.name: Chat commands mod
mods.description: An open source mod with a built in customizable bug reports system!
mods.author: Neverflagastralis

mods.name: SemiAutoLogin
mods.description: Press L to login without typing!
mods.author: Murturtle

mods.name: Blur
mods.description: Makes your fps 5 when unfocused!
mods.author: Murturtle

mods.name: Jetpack
mods.description: allows you to fly as if you had a jetpack. keybind(hold): h
mods.author: radmanplays

mods.name: Barney's Music Mod
mods.description: Plays a users music through a direct mp3 link. Saves music through Local Browser storage.
mods.author: BarneyTheGod

mods.name: Blink
mods.description: use by typing the .blinkon and .blinkoff commands and sending it
mods.author: ZXMushroom63

mods.name: GrappleHook
mods.description: grappling hook mod. how to use: 1.grab a fishing rod 2.use the fishing rod 3.grappling hook!
mods.author: ZXMushroom63

mods.name: Xray
mods.description: simple xray mod. its recommended to use this with Fullbright(modified version of ZXMushroom63's coal xray). keybind: x
mods.author: radmanplays

mods.name: Fullbright
mods.description: full bright mod for eaglerforge. keybind(enabled by default): f
mods.author: radmanplays

mods.name: Autoclicker
mods.description: this mod clicks for you
mods.author: radmanplays

mods.name: Speed Mod
mods.description: makes you faster
mods.author: radmanplays

mods.name: Chat Shortcuts
mods.description: shortcuts: {health}, {pos}, {name}, {me}, {x}, {y}, {z}, {level}, {walked}, {chunk}
mods.author: ZXMushroom63

mods.name: NoFall
mods.description: makes you not take fall damage
mods.author: ZXMushroom63

mods.name: AutoFish
mods.description: fishes for you. just throw a fishing rod in water to use this mod
mods.author: ZXMushroom63

mods.name: Recipe Mod
mods.description: This is a recipe mod for eaglerforge, a bit like JEI.
mods.author: Oeil-de-Lynx

mods.name: Auto Respawn
mods.description: auto respawn mod
mods.author: Oeil-de-Lynx

mods.name: Jump Boost
mods.description: jump boost mod
mods.author: Oeil-de-Lynx

mods.name: Player Vision
mods.description: player vision mod
mods.author: Oeil-de-Lynx

resourcepacks.name: Updated Textures for 1.8.9
resourcepacks.description: This resource pack aims to backport textures and sounds from the Texture Update and onward to Minecraft version 1.8.9.
resourcepacks.author: Arky

resourcepacks.name: Barebones Bossbars
resourcepacks.description: simplistic per-mob icons and colors to decorate boss bars with
resourcepacks.author: vexcenot

resourcepacks.name: Faithful (32x)
resourcepacks.description: The original Minecraft texture feel, with double the resolution and double the fun!
resourcepacks.author: Faithful-Resource-Pack

resourcepacks.name: Low On Fire
resourcepacks.description: Low fire on your screen! Vanilla Friendly
resourcepacks.author: Haikis

resourcepacks.name: Serified Font
resourcepacks.description: My take on a fancier Minecraft typeface
resourcepacks.author: bebebea_loste

resourcepacks.name: Default HD
resourcepacks.description: The classic Minecraft experience but in amazing 128x, 256x, and 512x HD! Gives a shaders feel without the awful FPS drop!
resourcepacks.author: thebaum64

resourcepacks.name: Diamonds to Netherite
resourcepacks.description: Soo... Minecraft added the new netherite block to the game and so i tought would be a great idea that i change the normal diamonds into the NETHERITE!
resourcepacks.author: The REAL Senpai

resourcepacks.name: Sweet Cherry 16x
resourcepacks.description: Sweet Cherry 16x is a pack made for Alcheras reaching 5,000 subscribers! Perfect for 1.8 player vs player such as bedwars, duels & skywars!
resourcepacks.author: VanillaSpooks
